name: Gifting
description: In 2017 after my first Burning Man its philosophy left a deep mark on me. I collaborated with ukrainian BM community member Oleksii Novikov to create an article about 10 BM principles. He was a writer, and I illustrated it with GIF animations, mostly based on my real paintings. I see a lot of parallels with the NFT and the Burner’s community, and that inspires me a lot. Now I feel like it's in our power to change the default world.Here’s the second of 10 Burning Man principles “Gifting”.
